title: GrpahQL query
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I have a forge article with https://forge.mlbinfra.com/#/wcm/stories/db467f36-a174-48e0-9484-e2fd43d4d99b
AND the article contains at least 1 valid Dynamic Include content
custom_expected:
THEN I should receive a valid response back
AND I should see the dynamic include data inside "data.story" response section
AND I should see the content matching between Forge and GraphQL response

title: Dynamic content will be displayed on x-fede
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I have a forge article with https://forge.mlbinfra.com/#/wcm/stories/db467f36-a174-48e0-9484-e2fd43d4d99b
AND the article contains at least 1 valid Dynamic Include content
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the Dynamic Include section
AND I should see the following:
Tune in tomorrow 12345678910
*Tune in tomorrow 12345678910
*Tune in tomorrow 12345678910*
link to tune-in tomorrow_or_today
